data.name: Micro Abyss
data.detailed_description:
Micro Abyss - action roguelike, in a subatomic procedurally generated universe. You, a descendant of an ancient deity, have to cleanse the Abyss from a rapidly spreading infection.



Key features:
  • Plunge into the atmosphere of a doomed world, which is about to be struck by an infection.
  • Learn the touching story of a disastrous threat.
  • Go through the evolutionary path from a frail child to the destroyer of any enemy.
  • Find all the friends in the Abyss, find out what they want and imbued with their stories.
  • Dynamic battles! Dodge shells, destroy enemies.
  • Open all genes, experiment with modifiers. Improve what you like.
